Remains

Color Grading   Cinematography   
Shot for the Scotland 48 Hour Film Challenge, 'Remains' is a short climate/action film. It was shot on the Saturday and graded on Sunday, based off a rough cut from Saturday evening (which was then transferred to the final cut on Sunday afternoon).

Full short film
